meanings.definition: Consisting of a single crystal structure.
meanings.sent1: The monocrystalline diamond sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The watch was made of monocrystalline sapphire, ensuring its durability.
meanings.sent3: The monocrystalline gemstone was so clear, it looked like a drop of water frozen in time.
meanings.sent4: Her monocrystalline focus on the task at hand made her unstoppable.
meanings.sent5: The monocrystalline structure of the snowflake was mesmerizing in its perfection.
